--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Shigeki Miyake-Stoner"
<shigekims@c...> wrote:
> Although the jpg does load faster, it is a bit ugly because of the
 softing of the edges.  I think there's a way you can prevent that, but
 still have the jpg format.

I hope so.  I joined a VB help list so that when I run into problems
coding Jsse, I have a place to go to get help fixing the bugs/finding
easier ways to solve the problems I'm running into.
